item.title: Tariffs: How they work, who pays for them and why Trump loves them
item.description: President Donald Trump in his inaugural speech credited President William McKinley for making the United States "very rich" through tariffs.

item.title: Trump's trade war could have a clear winner: The UK
item.description: Britain's economy could get a major boost if the country remains on the sidelines of Trump's trade war.
